column1: Cirith Gorgor was the point where the mountain ranges of the Ered Lithui and the Ephel Dúath met
column2: to the north-west of Udûn (valley) and Mordor. It was sealed by the Morannon (Black Gate) and guarded by the two Towers of the Teeth

column1: It was also called the Haunted Pass of Cirith Gorgor
column2: because of the evil that lurked there.

column1: Cirith Gorgor is Sindarin from cirith "pass" and gorgor "extreme horror".
